description: Regional Project For IDP Associations in Kosovo, Serbia and Montenegro

subproject.description:
Prevention of further crisis involuntary movements of Internaly Displaced Persons (IDPs) by improved coordination, monitoring and feedback mechanisms established within existing but enhanced and further developed regional IDP Associations’ network, and in this way direct linkage made to communities at risk in targeted areas
Improvement of  IDP/IIDP/DP living conditions by supporting and strengthening  further partnerships between IDP Associations, IDPs and local and central governmental institutions as well as CSOs through direct project implementation by IDP associations
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Internally Displaced Persons
